QuestData.Title: They Have A Pitlord
QuestData.Description: The Feltotem are not the first to embrace the temptations of the Burning Legion. And they will not be the last.$b$bBut in their arrogance, they have conjured a pit lord.$b$bWill you join us in battle against this beast? The power of your artifact and skill could prove invaluable against such a creature.
QuestData.CompletionText: I do not need my eyes to see the value you bring to this war.
QuestData.RewardText: The other demons we will contend with in time. But that pit lord, it was a creature of great evil and beyond our devices to defeat on our own. Your skills were appreciated.
